actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit loans by the Small Business Administration to businesses deriving any part of their revenues from gambling.

summary.text: Prohibits loans by the Small Business Administration to any borrowers deriving any portion of their revenues from gambling.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit loans by the Small Business Administration to businesses deriving any part of their revenues from gambling.
